definition: nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

pinyin: jin1 wo1 yin2 wo1 bu4 ru2 zi4 ji3 de5 gou3 wo1
containing_words.word: 金窝银窝不如自己的狗窝

sentences.english: That inspector inspected the kennels and the puppies in it .
sentences.chinese: 检查员检查了狗窝和里面的小狗。

sentences.english: The dog is kenneled at night.
On coop or kennel he hangs Parian wreaths;
sentences.chinese: 给鸡笼和狗窝挂上白色的花环。

sentences.english: Then they saw the dogs weren't in the pen.
sentences.chinese: 后来她们发现那狗不在狗窝里。
我就是住在一个狗窝里。

sentences.english: When was the last time you cleaned out the dog kennel?
sentences.chinese: 你上次是什么时候打扫狗窝的？

sentences.english: Marvin loves to sleep in his doghouse .
Down at the Institute, I was in the doghouse.
sentences.chinese: 在研究所里，我就是住在一个狗窝里。

sentences.english: She kennels her dog in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 她把狗关进院子的狗窝里。

sentences.english: From his seat at the bar, the dog licks my finger, nibbling gently at the tip.
sentences.chinese: 小狗窝在它主人怀里，舔我的手指，轻咬我的指尖。

sentences.english: London opening is so BAD that my dog ran back to his den half way through.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦奥运太水了，连我的狗都中途回到了狗窝。

sentences.english: Sporting dogs should be kept out of doors in a kennel .
sentences.chinese: 猎狗应该养在户外的狗窝中。

sentences.english: God, this place has gone to the dogs.
sentences.chinese: 上帝啊，这地方要变成狗窝了。

sentences.english: The bull-dog lay stretched on the straw outside his kennel .
sentences.chinese: 那只斗牛狗也伸长腿在狗窝前的草堆上懒洋洋地躺着。

sentences.english: Husbands and wives use thisdoghousedoghouse term when they are angry at each other.
sentences.chinese: 夫妇间在跟对方生气时也会使用狗窝一词。

definition: nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
spring mattress (loanword from "Simmons" bedding company name)
